page.description: Sends an e-mail message. All e-mail settings are passed in. Does not use an Alpha Five e-mail profile. To see what properties must be set in pSmtpSettings and pMessageSettings when coding, you can run the a5_ShowEmailSettings() function from the Interactive Window.
page.syntax: P Result = email_send_noprofile(P pSmtpSettings ,P pMessageSettings ,C secureMode [,L autoWrap [,L flagUseDotNetLibrary ]])

argument.name: autoWrap
argument.description: Logical. (optional) Word-wrapping mode; does not apply if flagUseDotNetLibrary is .t., and irrelevant for HTML mail; default is .T.

argument.name: flagUseDotNetLibrary
argument.description: Logical. (optional) By default, the e-mail is sent using Alpha Five's internal 'sockets' object. Since V11 has access to the full Microsoft .NET Framework, you can also send the e-mail using methods in the .NET Framework by setting this value to .T.; default is .F.

section.description: Returns an object with two properties:

case.title: pFlag.errorText
case.description: error text if there was an error

section.description: pSmtpSettings is an object with these properties:

case.title: psmtpSettings.smtp_server
case.description: the address of the smtp server. e.g.'smtp.gmail.com'

case.title: psmtpSettings.smtp_username
case.description: your email account user name, e.g. 'fred' or 'fred@mycompany.com'

case.title: psmtpSettings.smtp_port
case.description: the port e.g. 465. This depends on the server. For example with Gmail, the port is often 587

section.description: pMessageSettings is an object with these properties: (You can omit certain of the properties, if not needed)

case.title: pmessage.message
case.description: the plain text version of the message

case.title: pmessage.html_message
case.description: the html version of the message

case.title: pmessage.send_to
case.description: a comma delimited list of email addresses

case.title: pmessage.subject
case.description: the message subject, in plain text

case.title: pmessage.attachments
case.description: a comma delimited list of file attachements

case.title: pmessage.cc
case.description: a comma delimited list of email addresses

case.title: pmessage.bcc
case.description: a comma delimited list of email addresses

case.title: pmessage.from
case.description: the email address of the sender
